page.title: 13Harvesting Crops
page.content: Quite a lot of locals come and buy fruit to freeze or to use straight away.In early Autumn farmers employ pickers who come every working day to pick the apples and cherries from the orchards.Small-holding owners emloy locals to pick tomatoes,red currants, black currants,lettuces and other fruit and vegetables that they grow. My father owns Stone Hall and Friday street farm.We own about{400 } acres of land.We don't have{Dairy {cattle}we have{Beef cattle.}We have 6 tractors between the two farms.We employ plenty of men and women when we are strawberry and apple picking.There is a lot of farm {machinery}going up and down the lane. Around here it is good for farmers because the ground is fertile and we are not very far from London.
